# CONTRIBUTING

MealCraft also server as a learning resource for aspiring developers who want to dive in to backend/frontend development.

If you want to contribute to the project, you will find resources in our [wiki]().

We also recommend you to read our [Contributor code of conduct]().

## AUTHORS & CONTRIBUTORS

This project exists thanks to the [authors]().

All contributors, big or small, are appriciated!

Thanks!
